scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Nativity, with the Virgin Mary reclining on a bed, her head supported by her hand. Joseph stands behind her, leaning on a staff and looking towards her. Above them, in a manger-like structure, are the heads of a donkey and an ox. The background is a rich gold, suggesting a divine or sacred setting. The figures are rendered in a stylized, medieval manner with bold outlines and vibrant colors.
